page.title: 18POWLESLAND FARM CONTINDUED
page.content: After we had looked at the calves and seen the silos where the grain is stored,Mr Powlesland told us how he mixed 70% wheat,20% barley and 10% protein and vitamins together to feed the calves.He also showed us the mill where they grind the grain to a fine powder. Then Mr Powlesand took us to the old mill on Powlesland Farm. This was fun because as far as we know it has never been recorded or put on a map. So we thought it would be a good idea to record it for the first time in our 1985 Domesday Project. We discovered the place where the water wheel used to be,we touched the moss covered walls of the mill and we followed the leat to the river and we saw the flat land where the mill pond used to be and we thought about what it was like in the olden days.
